sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2d3c49ed83fb4210b0657a65eeaad36a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ReleaseNote</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ReleaseNote</name><script><![CDATA[var ReleaseNote = Class.create();
ReleaseNote.RELEASE_NOTE = 'u_release_notes';
ReleaseNote.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    /**
     * Checks to see if the current GlideRecord object has a note already attached.
     * @param {GlideRecord} current
     * @returns {Boolean} 
     */
    hasReleaseNote: function(current) {
        var record = new GlideRecord(ReleaseNote.RELEASE_NOTE);
        record.addEncodedQuery('u_document=' + current.getValue('u_document') + '^sys_id!=' + current.getValue('sys_id'));
        record.setLimit(1);
        record.query();
        return record.hasNext();
    },

    /**
     *  Used to pull a release note record if one is available. If one is not available,
    	the method returns null. So this can be checked by the client or server call as
    	needed.

		Calling from _GlideAjax_ use **sysparm_id** and pass in the **sys_id** you are trying to check for.

    	@param {string} document - sys_id used in a document field on the Release Notes table.
    	@returns {string|null} 
    */
    getReleaseNoteByDocument: function(document) {
        document = document || this.getParameter('sysparm_id');
        var record = new GlideRecord(ReleaseNote.RELEASE_NOTE);
        record.addEncodedQuery('u_document=' + document);
        record.setLimit(1);
        record.query();
        if (record.next()) return record.getValue('sys_id');
        return null;
    },

    type: 'ReleaseNote'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-08-03 11:47:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>2d3c49ed83fb4210b0657a65eeaad36a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReleaseNote</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2d3c49ed83fb4210b0657a65eeaad36a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-08-03 14:10:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
